com.spotify.sdk.android.playback

Class PlayerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spotify.sdk.android.playback.PlayerState

  • public class PlayerState
extends Object
    Class which holds information about the current player state

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean activeDevice
      True if the player is the active playback device (related to Spotify Connect)
      int durationInMs
      The duration of the currently playing track.
      boolean playing
      True if the player is currently playing
      int positionInMs
      The current position of the player, in milliseconds.
      boolean repeating
      True if repeat is enabled on the player
      boolean shuffling
      True if shuffle is enabled on the player
      String trackUri
      Current track uri

      Constructors

      PlayerState()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • playing

        public boolean playing
        True if the player is currently playing

      • shuffling

        public boolean shuffling
        True if shuffle is enabled on the player

      • repeating

        public boolean repeating
        True if repeat is enabled on the player

      • activeDevice

        public boolean activeDevice
        True if the player is the active playback device (related to Spotify Connect)

      • positionInMs

        public int positionInMs
        The current position of the player, in milliseconds. If the player is not currently playing, then this value is 0. If another device is playing via Spotify Connect, then this value is also 0. There is not currently an API call in the SDK to get the playback position for another playing device, sorry!

      • durationInMs

        public int durationInMs
        The duration of the currently playing track. Can be 0 if track is not loaded.

      • trackUri

        public String trackUri
        Current track uri

      • PlayerState

        public PlayerState()
